title.narrative: Nutrition Programme: Operation Research and Impact Evaluation (ORIE)

description.narrative: This activity (Nutrition Programme: Operation Research and Impact Evaluation (ORIE)) is a component of Working to Improving Nutrition in Northern Nigeria (WINNN) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £6,646,672. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Medical research. , with the following implementing partners: Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-09-2011 and the end date is 30-05-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
